title: Ezreal needs a rework so that he's not so obnoxious to play against
body: His kit is just boring and uninteractive... He just sits there and Qs at you til you're low enough to all in. If you manage to catch him, he has a low CD flash on top of his SS flash. I'm not even saying he's OP or anything, he's just annoying and anti-fun to play with or against.

replies.body: just his q needs a bit of tweaking, nothing wrong with the rest of him also needs a model update but theres numerous champs that do also ezreal should be deleted
